header.field: Subject: A complex nested multipart example

multipart.preamble: The preamble of the outer multipart message. Mail readers that understand multipart format should ignore this preamble. If you are reading this text, you might want to consider changing to a mail reader that understands how to properly display multipart messages.

header.field: Subject: Part 3 of the outer message is multipart!

multipart.preamble: A one-line preamble for the inner multipart message.

header.field: Subject: Part 1 of the inner message is a GIF, "3d-vise.gif"
Subject: Part 2 of the inner message is another GIF, "3d-eye.gif"

multipart.epilogue: The epilogue for the inner multipart message.

header.field: Subject: Part 5 of the outer message is itself an RFC822 message!

multipart.epilogue: The epilogue for the outer message.
